section.title: Installing Remote Viewer on Windows
section.para: The Remote Viewer application provides users with a graphical console for connecting to virtual machines. Once installed, it is called automatically when attempting to open a SPICE session with a virtual machine. Alternatively, it can also be used as a standalone application.

step.para: Open a web browser and download one of the following installers according to the architecture of your system.
Open the folder where the file was saved.
Click Run if prompted by a security warning.
Click Yes if prompted by User Account Control.

section.para: Remote Viewer is installed and can be accessed via Remote Viewer in the VirtViewer folder of All Programs in the start menu.
